title: Boy from the block
creator_credit: Jeffrey Robertson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeffrey Robertson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
